text: Mambo is a 1954 Italian American drama movie directed by Robert Rossen and starring Silvana Mangano, Michael Rennie, Vittorio Gassman, Shelley Winters, Katherine Dunham, Mary Clare, Eduardo Ciannelli. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1954 drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Rossen Category:Movies set in Venice
title: Mambo (movie)
